name: The Groves of Reflection
description: A sacred forest where the luminous flora emit a kaleidoscope of colors, creating reflections that reveal glimpses of the past and possible futures. It is here that the celestial artifacts are said to be hidden, guarded by the Elderglow themselves. The Veilen and Terrae often journey to these groves to commune with the spirits and seek guidance through visions.

name: Luminar Peak
description: A towering mountain that pierces the twilight sky, crowned by an ancient citadel. This is the stronghold of the Elderglow, where they gather to perform celestial rites that maintain Gokia's mystical balance. The peak is a place of pilgrimage for those who wish to attune themselves to the realm's ethereal forces.

name: Whispering Glade
description: Nestled in the heart of Gokia, this serene meadow is alive with the voices of the enchanted winds. Each breeze carries stories of old, shared with those who pause to listen. The glade is a neutral ground where tribes gather for diplomatic meetings and to exchange tales, fostering unity among the inhabitants.

name: The Shadowed Marsh
description: An enigmatic and treacherous expanse where the influence of the Harbingers of Ash is most potent. Here, the magic of Gokia is twisted and dark, culminating in a landscape of eerie beauty. The marsh is both feared and respected, as it holds many secrets and serves as a warning of the dangers posed by unchecked power.

name: River of Memories
description: A sentient river that meanders through the realm, its waters shimmering with the glow of captured memories. Those who dare to drink from it may find themselves submerged in vivid visions of their own past and the countless stories it has absorbed. This river serves as a vital artery, connecting various tribes and facilitating the flow of knowledge throughout Gokia.
